amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part C of House Report 117-10 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 3, 4, 5, 6, and 8.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Nadler.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Nadler amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Nadler.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
